Ingredients.6: 1 medium yellow squash, cut into 1/4-inch slices

Ingredients.7: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Heat butter and olive oil together in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion once butter is bubbly; cook and stir for 2 minutes. Add bell pepper and cook for 1 minute. Stir in yellow squash and zucchini slices. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, for about 3 minutes.

Directions.2: Stir in minced garlic and cook, stirring, about 1 minute. Keep cooking, stirring continuously, until squash has desired texture, 2 to 3 minutes.

Directions.3: Sprinkle with minced chives before serving.
